title: @Riot Final Boss Veigar Theme
body:
I couldn't find it on your soundcloud. Do you still have it? Could you release it?

I love {{champion:45}}  and would absolutely love it if you let us download the song used in his video.

replies.body: We'll work on getting more of the newest stuff up the Soundcloud after Worlds - thanks for being patient =)
Okay, thanks! I'll be looking forward to it!
Still waiting for that Sion Log in screen ;-;
